description: Frontend Application Setup - Foundational Next.js 15 web application for the World Cup 2026 Decentralized Prediction Game

userStories.title: Initialize Next.js 15 Project
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a properly initialized Next.js 15 project so that I can build the prediction game frontend.
acceptanceCriteria: Next.js 15 project created using create-next-app with App Router
TypeScript configured with strict mode enabled in tsconfig.json
Project builds successfully with npm run build
Development server starts with npm run dev
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Configure Environment Variables
userStories.description: As a developer, I need environment configuration so that I can switch between devnet and mainnet.
acceptanceCriteria: .env.example file created with all required variables documented
.env.local added to .gitignore
Environment variables defined: NEXT_PUBLIC_SOLANA_NETWORK, NEXT_PUBLIC_SOLANA_RPC_URL, NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL
config/env.ts created to validate and export typed env variables
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Added .env.example with devnet/mainnet config, created src/config/env.ts with runtime validation

userStories.title: Configure Tailwind CSS with WC2026 Theme
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Tailwind CSS configured so that I can style components efficiently.
acceptanceCriteria: Tailwind CSS installed and configured with tailwind.config.ts
Global styles imported in app/globals.css
Content paths configured for app/**/*.{ts,tsx} and components/**/*.{ts,tsx}
Custom theme colors defined: primary (#1a365d), secondary (#2d3748), accent (#38a169)
Dark mode support configured (class-based)
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Tailwind v4 uses @theme blocks in CSS. Created tailwind.config.ts for compatibility and globals.css with full color scales.

userStories.title: Install and Configure shadcn/ui
userStories.description: As a developer, I need shadcn/ui initialized so that I can use pre-built accessible components.
acceptanceCriteria: shadcn/ui initialized with npx shadcn@latest init
components.json configuration file created
Base components installed: Button, Card, Input, Dialog, Toast
Components directory structure: components/ui/ for shadcn components
lib/utils.ts created with cn() helper function
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Used sonner instead of deprecated toast component. Added tw-animate-css package for animations.

userStories.title: Establish Folder Structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a consistent folder structure so that the codebase is organized and maintainable.
acceptanceCriteria: app/(routes)/ directory created for route groups
components/layout/ directory created for Header, Footer, etc.
components/shared/ directory created for reusable components
hooks/ directory created for custom React hooks
stores/ directory created for Zustand stores
types/ directory created for TypeScript type definitions
providers/ directory created for React context providers
lib/constants.ts created for app constants
Each directory contains a placeholder file or .gitkeep
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Created all directory structures with .gitkeep placeholders. Added lib/constants.ts with app constants.

userStories.title: Configure ESLint and Prettier
userStories.description: As a developer, I need consistent code formatting so that the codebase maintains quality standards.
acceptanceCriteria: ESLint configured with Next.js recommended rules
Prettier installed and configured (.prettierrc)
ESLint Prettier plugin installed to avoid conflicts
npm run lint script works
npm run format script added for Prettier
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Added eslint-config-prettier for conflict avoidance, prettier-plugin-tailwindcss for class sorting. Scripts: format, format:check, lint:fix.

userStories.title: Set Up React Query Provider
userStories.description: As a developer, I need React Query configured so that I can manage server state and API caching.
acceptanceCriteria: @tanstack/react-query and @tanstack/react-query-devtools installed
QueryClientProvider component created in providers/QueryProvider.tsx
Query client configured with sensible defaults (staleTime, retry logic)
React Query Devtools enabled in development mode
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Configured with sensible defaults: staleTime 1min, gcTime 5min, retry 3 for queries, retry 1 for mutations. Devtools enabled in development only.

userStories.title: Configure Solana Wallet Adapter
userStories.description: As a developer, I need wallet adapter integration so that users can connect their Solana wallets.
acceptanceCriteria: @solana/wallet-adapter-react, @solana/wallet-adapter-react-ui, and @solana/wallet-adapter-wallets installed
@solana/web3.js installed for Solana interactions
WalletContextProvider component created in providers/WalletProvider.tsx
Wallet adapters configured: Phantom, Backpack, Solflare
Wallet adapter CSS imported (@solana/wallet-adapter-react-ui/styles.css)
Network configurable via environment variable (devnet/mainnet)
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Installed @solana/wallet-adapter packages. Configured Phantom, Solflare, Coinbase adapters. Backpack auto-detected via Wallet Standard.

userStories.title: Set Up Zustand State Management
userStories.description: As a developer, I need Zustand configured so that I can manage client-side state.
acceptanceCriteria: zustand package installed
Example store created in stores/useAppStore.ts with basic structure
Store includes: wallet connection status, selected network, UI state (loading, modals)
Zustand devtools middleware enabled in development
Persist middleware example for relevant state
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create Root Layout with Providers
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a root layout that wraps the app with all necessary providers.
acceptanceCriteria: app/layout.tsx created with proper HTML structure
All providers wrapped in correct order: QueryProvider > WalletProvider > children
Metadata configured (title, description, OpenGraph basics)
Font configured (Inter)
Toaster component from shadcn/ui included for notifications
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create Navigation Header Component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a navigation header component so that users can navigate the app and connect their wallet.
acceptanceCriteria: components/layout/Header.tsx component created
Logo/brand placeholder displayed
Navigation links placeholder (to be populated in future PRDs)
WalletMultiButton integrated in header
Responsive design (mobile hamburger menu structure, content deferred)
